thread.title: A Revolutionary Change Airwheel Annular Electric Scooter F3
thread.title_full: A Revolutionary Change Airwheel Annular Electric Scooter F3

title: A Revolutionary Change Airwheel Annular Electric Scooter F3
text: A Revolutionary Change Airwheel Annular Electric Scooter F3 , 24 October 2015 -- Airwheel rolled out four new models on its New Product Release Conference on Sep 29th, 2015. F3 is the only annular one-wheeled electric scooter among the new models. It has been a revolutionary change of the unicycles.Airwheel rolled out four new models on its New Product Release Conference on Sep 29th, 2015. F3 is the only annular one-wheeled electric scooter among the new models. It has been a revolutionary change of the unicycles. As a brand new kind of unicycle, Airwheel has adopted many advanced technologies and fashionable designs in producing F3. Although Airwheel orbit electric unicycle F3 still continues the classical one-wheeled structure, it looks so different from the former the previous Airwheel unicycles. Airwheel has used the innovative hollow ring design in F3 for the first time. The new design pushes science and technology to subtraction from addition. What’s more, the annular body of F3 is covered by a transparent shell which is made of PC+ABS composite materials. The materials have many features, such as heat resistance, cold endurance, flame resistance and impact resistance. With the help of the shells, Airwheel F3 is safer and more fashionable. Owing to the hollow ring design, Airwheel F3 is so easy for users to carry. Many people may think it is no need to add a handle in F3. In fact, Airwheel single-wheeled scooters F3 have concealed handles which are made of magnesium alloy and elastic polyurethane. The handles of F3 are vey soft and hidden in the bodies in normal times. If riders want to use them, they can be popup as soon as possible. The pedals of Airwheel annular intelligent scooter F3 are anti-skidding and frosting. The headlight and taillight can make them cool and unique on the streets when users ride on F3. And the lights ensure the safety of riding in evenings. In addition, Airwheel F3 has a dedicated APP. After installing the APP in users’ phones, they can know the conditions of F3 anywhere anytime. Different from traditional unicycles, Airwheel orbit intelligent scooters F3 are cooler and more fashionable. With the advanced technologies and designs, Airwheel F3 can make users’ cycling safer and more exciting. About: Established in 2004, Airwheel Technology was initiated by a group of pioneers who took constant adventure to reshape the world with edged technology. With a global view, the U.S.-based enterprise started to build since its establishment R&D centers located in L.A., Beijing, and Changzhou, a marketing center in Beijing and a manufacturing center in Changzhou. As the leader in global portable intelligent transport industry, we have been dedicated to extend the fun and benefit of cutting-edge technology to everywhere in the world. Media Contact: Company Name: Airwheel Technology Holding Co., Ltd Contact Person: Mr Tang Address: FL9 Zhongchuang, 396 Tongjiang Road, Changzhou, Jiangsu, China E-mail:
